Class CPTtanks

java.lang.Object
CPTtanks
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
public class CPTtanks
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener

Doodle Tanks (CPTtanks Main)

By: Atilla Awista, Kalea Tse, Noor Qureshi
Date: January 27, 2022

This is the main file used for Doodle Tanks

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CPTtanks()
    The constructor that is used to build or "construct" the program.

    Activates when an ActionEvent occurs.

  • Constructor Details

    • CPTtanks

      public CPTtanks()
      The constructor that is used to build or "construct" the program. It initializes the GUI / javaxswing elements of the code.
      Ex. The buttons are initialized here. Their sizes and location are set. ActionListeners are added to each one. And they are added to the panel. Their settings, setEnabled and setVisible, vary based on when they are of use.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
      Activates when an ActionEvent occurs. When activated, the code for that specific event runs. The function of events vary based on the ActionEvent source.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt)
      Upon key being released, get key character or code (getKeyChar() or getKeyCode()). Actions in the program are based on whichever key is being obtained.
      Eg. if key is 'd', stop tank movement by changing tank deflection to 0.
      Specified by:
      keyReleased in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt)
      Upon key being pressed, get key character or code (getKeyChar() or getKeyCode()). Actions in the program are based off of the key that is obtained.
      Eg. if key is 'd', move tank to right by changing tank deflection.
      Specified by:
      keyPressed in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener

    • keyTyped

      public void keyTyped​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt)
      Activates when a key is typed (waits for both keypressed and keyreleased combined). This method has no function in our program
      Specified by:
      keyTyped in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener

    • moveTank

      public void moveTank​(java.lang.String strMove)
      When function is activated (tank moves), get string value. Set strSSM to the string value and send SSM to other player to display on their screen.

    • movingTank

      public void movingTank()
      Creates tank boundaries (for movement), stopping tanks from being able to leave the screen or pass the center obstacle. Sends out updated tank position to other player using SSM. Requests focus onto the game frame. Haltstank controls while in main menu and resumes them once in game.

    • allowShooting

      public void allowShooting()
      Plays explosion sound effect, allows tanks to move, and toggles blnserverTurn in order to switch to next tank's turn.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method us used to initialize and run the program.
